typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		name as string,
		value as double,
		RowKey as string,
		PartitionKey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'document') ~> weights
DerivedColumn1 parse(name = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		value = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	format: 'json',
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> Parse2
weights derive(name = lpad(columns('name'), 10, ' '),
		value = lpad(columns('value'), 8, '0')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: false,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> cache
Parse2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: false,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1
